form.name: club_foot
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Other Serious Conditions, Birth Injury & Abnormalities> Club Foot

field.name: Refer mother and baby to a health center or hospital for special treatment
Advise mother to have another family member accompany her and the baby to the health facility
Record baby’s clinical information in client’s maternal health or “Red” book. If possible, also fill out referral form
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
